import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Card({ title, content }) { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); return (
setIsOpen(!isOpen)} >
{title}
{isOpen ? ( ) : ( )}
{content}
SAIBA MAIS!
); }
